text: Goldbergturm The Goldbergturm is a 51 metre high water tower on the Goldberg (gold mountain) at in Sindelfingen, Germany. The Goldbergturm was built in 1963 and has in its basket, besides a water reservoir, a restaurant from which a stairway runs to its open-air observation deck. ==External links== * *Skyscraperpage.com entry Category:Water towers in Germany
title: Goldbergturm
